ch.aplu.android
Class GGPreferences

java.lang.Object
  ch.aplu.android.GGPreferences

public class GGPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to simplify storage and retrieval of persistent data. The data stored can be retrieved at the next program execution. An instance of this class is created before the GameGrid main() is called and its reference may be obtained with GameGrid.getPrefs().

Constructor Summary
GGPreferences(android.app.Activity activity)
          Creates a GGPreferences instance to retrieve and store default shared preferences of the given activity.
